nodes.text: Peril in the Kailion Caves was a Star Wars Miniatures scenario written by Jason Tanner and released on Wizards.com on December 7, 2007. The rules for the scenario allow for use by a single player.
A group of Jedi tracking information on the Sheyasti Trade Syndicate have found themselves trapped in a rockslide in the Kailion Caves.
They must escape the caves with their data droid while facing the creatures stalking them.
